sentences.sContent: The state of Nevada is largely desert.
sentences.sCn: 内华达州大部分是沙漠。

sentences.sContent: ...and they are largely taken for granted until they fail...
...the group took largely the same approach it did in1999...
...while racially restrictive agreements largely prevented them from buying into the suburban neighborhoods being built for white working-class families...
...largely because they no longer had access to affordable health care...

...The pervasive undervaluation on elementary skills that we find among current students and even some teachers can largely be attributed to their lack of vision of future and thorough understanding on the knowledge...
...Male economists overwhelmingly think the wage gap between men and women is largely the result of individuals' skills...
...The fund-raising ability is largely a product of experience and necessity...
...the lives of black women go largely unexamined...
